src:
Piperu poveren duel Javor – Crvena zvezda
07 Nov 2019, 14:09 by Milos
Sudijska komisija Fudbalskog savza Srbije delegirala je sudije za mečeve 16. kola Linglong SLS.
Lider na tabeli Crvena zvezda gostuje Javoru u Ivanjici u nedelju, 10. novembra od 14.30 časova, a ovaj susret poveren je arbitru Petru Piperu. U svojstvu pomoćnika biće Pavle Piper i Marko Đuričić.
Partizan dočekuje Inđiju na stadionu u Humskoj, a ovaj duel je zakazan za nedelju od 16.30 časova. Pravdu će deliti Milan Ilić, dok su za pomoćne arbitre određeni Ivica Stojanović i Oliver Petrović.
Kompletan spisak delegiranih sudija za 16. kola možete pogledati ovde.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Piper entrusted maple duel - Red Star
07 Nov 2019, 14:09 by Milos
The refereeing committee of the Football Union of Serbia has delegated referees for the rounds of the 16th Linglong SLS.
The leader on the Red Star table is visiting Javor in Ivanjica on Sunday, November 10th from 2.30pm, and this meeting was entrusted to arbitrator Peter Piper. Assistants will be Pavle Piper and Marko Djuricic.
Partizan welcome Indjija to the stadium in Humska, and this duel is scheduled for Sunday from 4.30pm. Justice will be shared by Milan Ilic, while Ivica Stojanovic and Oliver Petrovic will be appointed assistant arbitrators.
The complete list of delegated judges for Round 16 can be viewed here.
